item.title: Demo of Graide: AI Powered Assistive Grading Engine
item.description:
I have been helping people at 6bit by testing and adding new features to Graide, a platform that reduces grading workload while increasing the quality of feedback given to students. Take a look at how it works!

I have been demo-ing at L@S2022 where the issues related to teaching and learning at scale have been discussed.
